ModMetaData.name: More Medications
ModMetaData.author: ✬Rustic Fox✬
ModMetaData.description:
Adds more medications to Rimworld. For those who need more than squirrel meat and rice. Adds Multivitamins, Sleeping pills, ADHD Meds, Painkillers and Antidepressants.
Credits
